snippet: Confusing economic comments - first by Bill Clinton, then by Lawrence Summers - have emboldened Republicans to say they have bipartisan backing for the extension of Bush-era tax cuts.
abstract: Confusing economic comments - first by Bill Clinton, then by Lawrence Summers - have emboldened Republicans to say they have bipartisan backing for the extension of Bush-era tax cuts.

headline.main: Summers's Comment Adds to Confusion Over Extending Tax Cuts
